    <div><div class="footerContainer"></div><hr class="pageBreak" style="margin:18pt 0pt; ct-page-break: true; page-break-after: always;"/><div class="headerContainer"></div></div>
    <div><p dir="ltr" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 12pt;line-height: 108%;margin-bottom: .001pt;margin-left: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-top: 0;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap; font-size: 12pt;font-style: normal;font-weight: normal;margin: 0;padding: 0;"> </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;line-height: 108%;margin-bottom: .001pt;margin-left: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-top: 12pt;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;font-style: normal;font-weight: bold;margin: 0;padding: 0;">Item&#160;2.02 Results of Operations and Financial Condition. </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;line-height: 108%;margin-bottom: .001pt;margin-left: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-top: 6pt;text-indent: 0.50in;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;font-style: normal;font-weight: normal;margin: 0;padding: 0;">On February 06, 2024, we issued a press release announcing earnings and other financial results for our fourth quarter and fiscal year ended December 31, 2023, and that management would review these results in a conference call at 4:30 pm Eastern time on February 06, 2024.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;line-height: 107.9%;margin-bottom: 0;margin-left: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-top: 12pt;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;font-style: normal;font-weight: bold;margin: 0;padding: 0;">Item 8.01 Other Events.&#160; </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;line-height: 107.9%;margin-bottom: 0;margin-left: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-top: 6pt;text-indent: 0.50in;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;font-style: normal;font-weight: normal;margin: 0;padding: 0;">On February 06, 2024, we announced that our Board of Directors has authorized repurchases of common stock with a total aggregate purchase price of $200 million, exclusive of commissions. This repurchase authorization is in addition to previously announced repurchase authorizations. The repurchase program may be modified, suspended, or discontinued at any time.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;line-height: 108%;margin-bottom: .001pt;margin-left: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-top: 12pt;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap; 			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">Chipotle ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">AND FULL YEAR </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;"> RESULTS</font>
		</p>

inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Adjusted diluted earnings per share, which e</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">d</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> a $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">0</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">52</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> after-tax impact from expenses related to</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> restaurant and corporate level impairment and closure costs</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">accelerated </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">depreciation</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> and</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> corporate restructuring, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">partially offset by</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">a reduction in </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">contingencies related to </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">certain legal proceedings</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">$44.86</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">a &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">36.9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">crease from </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">$32.78</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">1</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;">
				<font style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>
			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Opened </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">271</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> new restaurants</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> with 2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">38</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> locations including a Chipotlane</font><a name="_Hlk504391754"></a><a name="_Hlk87358549"></a></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">"2023 was an outstanding year where we delivered strong transaction growth</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> driven by throughput and menu innovation</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, opened a record number of new restaurants, surpassed $3 million in AUVs and formed our first international partnership,&#x201D; said&nbsp;Brian Niccol, Chairman and CEO, Chipotle. &#x201C;I am more confident than ever that we have the right people and the right strategy to achieve our long-term growth goals of reaching 7,000 restaurants in North America, $4 million in AUVs, expanding our industry leading margins and returns and furthering our purpose of Cultivating a Better World globally.&#x201D; </font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:9pt 0pt 4.5pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

		</p>
		<p><font size="1"> </font></p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 8pt">

			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">1 &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">Restaurant level operating margin,&nbsp;adjusted diluted earnings per share, adjusted net income,&nbsp;non-GAAP general and administrative expenses, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">adjusted depreciation and amortization, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">and non-GAAP effective income tax rate&nbsp;are non-GAAP financial measures. Reconciliations to GAAP measures and further information are set forth in the table at the end of this press release.</font>

		</p>

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div><hr size="3" style="color:#999999" width="100%" align="center"></hr><p style="page-break-after:always">&nbsp;</p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div>
		<p style="margin:9pt 0pt 4.5pt;font-family:Times New Roman;;font-size: 10pt"><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;">Results for the three months ended December 31, 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;">:</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">Total revenue in the fourth quarter was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">$2.5</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> billion, an increase of </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">15.4%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> compared to the fourth quarter of 20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">. &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The increase in total revenue was driven b</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">y an</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">8.4%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">increase in comparable restaurant sales attributable to higher transactions</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> of 7.4%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> and</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">an increase in average check </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">of 1.0%, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">to a lesser extent, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">new restaurant openings. Digital sales represented 36.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% of total food and beverage revenue.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">We opened </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">21</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> new restaurants during the </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">fourth</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> quarter with </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">110</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> locations including a Chipotlane. These formats continue to perform well and are helping enhance guest access and convenience, as well as increase new restaurant sales, margins, and returns.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">Food, beverage and packaging costs in the fourth quarter were </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">29.7%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> of total revenue, a</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">n inc</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">rease</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> of </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">40</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> basis points compared to the fourth quarter of 20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">. &nbsp;</font><a name="_Hlk156819016"></a><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">Food</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> costs increased due to a higher </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">mix</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> of beef as well as inflation across the menu, most notably higher costs for beef, produce, and queso. These increases were partially offset by the benefit of menu price increases and, to a lesser extent, lower paper costs</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">Restaurant level operating margin </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">in the fourth quarter </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">5.4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> compared to </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">24.0%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> in the fourth quarter of 20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> &nbsp;T</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">he improvement was primarily due to the benefit of sales leverage and, to a lesser extent, lower </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">paper costs</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">. These decreases were partially offset by higher inflation across several food costs and</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> to a lesser extent, wage inflation.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">General and administrative expenses for the fourth quarter were&nbsp;$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">69.2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million&nbsp;on a GAAP basis, or&nbsp;$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">170.0</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;on a non-GAAP basis, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">excluding</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> &nbsp;a</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> &nbsp;$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">0.8</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">reduction in </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">contingencies </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">related to certain legal proceedings</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">. &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">GAAP and non-GAAP general and administrative expenses for the </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">fourth</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> quarter also include $1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">22.0</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million of underlying general and administrative expenses, $3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">5.7</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million of non-cash stock compensation, $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">10.1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million of higher </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">bonus</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> accruals and payroll taxes on equity vesting and exercises and $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">2.2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million of other costs, primarily related to our upcoming All Managers Conference scheduled for the first quarter of 2024.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<a name="_Hlk156818352"></a><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">effective income tax rate </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">for the fourth quarter </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">6</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% compared to </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">6.3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% in the fourth quarter of 20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The slight decrease in the tax rate was primarily due to an increase in tax benefits from option exercises and equity vesting</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">partially offset by an increase in tax reserves and nondeductible expenses</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Net income for the fourth quarter was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">$282.1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> million, or </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">$10.21</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> per diluted share, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">compared to</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">$223.7</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> million, or </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">$8.02</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> per diluted share, in the fourth quarter of 2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">02</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Excluding </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">$0.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">15</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">after-tax impact from expenses related to </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">accelerated </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">depreciation</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, partially offset by </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">a reduction in </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">contingencies related to </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">certain </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">legal proceedings</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">adjusted </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> million</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">and adjusted </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">diluted earnings per share was $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">10.36</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<a name="_Hlk87358571"></a><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">During the </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">fourth </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">quarter, our Board of Directors approved the investment of up to an additional $200 million, exclusive of commissions, to repurchase shares of our common stock, subject to market conditions. Including this repurchase authorization, $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">24.1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> million was available as of December 31, 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. The repurchase authorization may be modified, suspended, or discontinued at any time. We repurchased $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">44.3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> million of stock at an average price per share of $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">935.80</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> during the fourth quarter.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Results for the full year ended December 31, 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">:</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Total revenue for 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">$9.9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> billion, an increase of </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">14.3%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> compared to 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The increase in total revenue was driven by </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">a 7.9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">increase in comparable restaurant sales attributable to higher transactions</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> of 5</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.0</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% and</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> an increase in average check</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> of 2.9% and, to a lesser extent</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">new restaurant openings. Digital sales represented 3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">7.4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% of total food and beverage revenue.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">We opened </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">71</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> new restaurants during </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2023</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, bringing the total restaurant count at year-end to </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">3,437</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. Of the </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">271</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> new restaurants opened during the year, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">38</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">locations </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">included a Chipotlane. </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">We had</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> a total of </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">811</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> Chipotlanes as of year-end</font><font style="display: inline;">, &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">which includes conversions of existing restaurants</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Food, beverage and packaging costs </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">for 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">were </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">29.5%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> of total revenue, a decrease of </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">60</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> basis points compared to 20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">Food costs benefited from</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> menu price increases</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> and,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">to a lesser extent, lower avocado cost</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">s</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">. These benefits were </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">partially offset by inflation across </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">several </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">ingredient </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">costs</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">, most notably</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">beef, tortillas, and queso.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Restaurant level operating margin </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">for 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">was</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> 26.2% compared to 23.9%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> in 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">T</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">he improvement was primarily due to the benefit of sales leverage and, to a lesser extent, lower avocado prices. These decreases were partially offset by higher inflation across several food costs</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> to a lesser extent, wage inflation.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

		</p>
		<p><font size="1"> </font></p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 8pt">

			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">1 &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">Restaurant level operating margin,&nbsp;adjusted diluted earnings per share, adjusted net income,&nbsp;non-GAAP general and administrative expenses, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">adjusted depreciation and amortization, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">and non-GAAP effective income tax rate&nbsp;are non-GAAP financial measures. Reconciliations to GAAP measures and further information are set forth in the table at the end of this press release.</font>

		</p>

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div><hr size="3" style="color:#999999" width="100%" align="center"></hr><p style="page-break-after:always">&nbsp;</p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;;font-size: 10pt"><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">General and administrative expenses </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">for </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">were&nbsp;$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">633.6</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million&nbsp;on a GAAP basis, or&nbsp;$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">629.6</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;on a non-GAAP basis, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">excluding </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">$4.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">8</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million of corporate restructuring costs </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">and a $0.8</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">reduction in </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">contingencies </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">related to certain legal proceedings</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">. &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">GAAP and non-GAAP </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">General</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> and administrative expenses for </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">full year</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> also include $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">78.9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million of underlying general and administrative expenses, $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">118.5</font><font style="display: equity vesting and exercises and $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">6.9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million of other costs, primarily related to our upcoming All Managers Conference scheduled for the first quarter of 2024.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<a name="_Hlk505335379"></a><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The effective income tax rate</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> for 2023</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">4.2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% compared to </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">23.9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% in 20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The increase in the tax rate was primarily due to fewer tax benefits related to option exercises and equity vesting.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Net income for 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">3</font><font style="display: &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">E</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">xclud</font><font style="display: style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, adjusted net income </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">for 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">was $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font><font style="display: per share was $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">44.86</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">During </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2023 we</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> repurchased </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">a total of </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">589.8</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> million of stock at an average price per share of $1,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">827.46.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">More information will be available in our Annual Report on Form 10-K, which </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">will be filed with</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> the SEC </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">in early February 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font>

		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Definitions</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> following definitions apply to these terms as used throughout this release:</font>
		</p>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
				<font style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Symbol;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>
			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Comparable restaurant sales, or sales comps, and comparable restaurant transactions, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">represent the change in period-over-period total revenue or transactions for restaurants in operation for at least 13 full calendar months.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
				<font style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>
			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Average restaurant sales </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">refer to the average trailing 12-month food and beverage revenue for restaurants in operation for at least 12 full calendar months.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
				<font style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>
			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Restaurant level operating margin</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> represents total revenue less direct restaurant operating costs, expressed as a percent of total revenue.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
				<font style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>
			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Digital sales</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> represent food and beverage revenue generated through the Chipotle website, Chipotle app or third-party delivery aggregators. Digital sales </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">clude revenue deferrals associated with Chipotle Rewards.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Conference Call Details</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Chipotle</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">will</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> host a conference call on Tuesday, February </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">6</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, at 4:30 PM Eastern time</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">to discuss fourth quarter and full year 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> financial results</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, as well as provide a business update for the 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> first quarter.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">conference</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> call can be accessed live over the phone by dialing 1-888-317-6003</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> or for international callers by dialing 1-412-317-6061</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> and use code: </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2191312</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. The call will be webcast live from the company's website on the investor relations page at ir.chipotle.com/events. An archived webcast will be available approximately one hour after the end of the call.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

		</p>
		<p><font size="1"> </font></p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 8pt">

			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">1 &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">Restaurant level operating margin,&nbsp;adjusted diluted earnings per share, adjusted net income,&nbsp;non-GAAP general and administrative expenses, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">adjusted depreciation and amortization, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">and non-GAAP effective income tax rate&nbsp;are non-GAAP financial measures. Reconciliations to GAAP measures and further information are set forth in the table at the end of this press release.</font>

</div>
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;;font-size: 10pt"><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">About Chipotle</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">Chipotle Mexican Grill, Inc. (NYSE: CMG) is cultivating a better world by serving responsibly sourced, classically-cooked, real food with wholesome ingredients without artificial colors, flavors or preservatives. Chipotle had </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">over</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">3,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">00</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> restaurants as of December 31, 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">, in the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, France and Germany and is the only restaurant company of its size that owns and operates all its restaurants</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> in North America and Europe</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">. Chipotle is ranked on the Fortune 500 and is recognized on Fortune&#x2019;s Most Admired Companies</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">2024 list </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">and Time Magazine</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&#x2019;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">s Most Influential Companies</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">. With </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">over</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> &nbsp;1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">5</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">,000 employees passionate about providing a great guest experience, Chipotle is a longtime leader and innovator in the food industry. Chipotle is committed to making its food more accessible to everyone while continuing to be a brand with a demonstrated purpose as it leads the way in digital, technology and sustainable business practices. For more information or to place an order online, visit </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#C08C19;background-color: #FFFFFF;">WWW.CHIPOTLE.COM</font><font style="display: inline;">.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			&nbsp;
		</p></div><div style="margin-left:36pt;margin-right:36pt;">
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

		</p>
		<p><font size="1"> </font></p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 8pt">

			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">1 &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">Restaurant level operating margin,&nbsp;adjusted diluted earnings per share, adjusted net income,&nbsp;non-GAAP general and administrative expenses, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">adjusted depreciation and amortization, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">and non-GAAP effective income tax rate&nbsp;are non-GAAP financial measures. Reconciliations to GAAP measures and further information are set forth in the table at the end of this press release.</font>

		</p>

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;;font-size: 10pt"><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Forward-Looking Statements </font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">Certain </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">statements in this press release and in the </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">February</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">6</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">, 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">, &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">conference call are forward-looking statements as defined in the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995, including statements under &#x201C;Outlook&#x201D; about our anticipated full year 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;"> comparable restaurant sales growth, goals for number of new restaurant openings, and estimated underlying effective full year tax rate, as well as statements about </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">first quarter 2024 business results to date, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">expected restaurants with Chipotlanes and rate of expansion, future labor costs, future general and administrative and other costs, future estimated tax rates and future long-term prospects. We use words such as &#x201C;anticipate&#x201D;, &#x201C;believe&#x201D;, &#x201C;could&#x201D;, &#x201C;should&#x201D;, &#x201C;may&#x201D;, &#x201C;approximately&#x201D;, &#x201C;estimate&#x201D;, &#x201C;expect&#x201D;, &#x201C;intend&#x201D;, &#x201C;project&#x201D;, &#x201C;target&#x201D;,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;"> &#x201C;goal&#x201D;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;"> and similar terms and phrases, including references to assumptions, to identify forward-looking statements. The forward-looking statements in this press release are based on currently available operating, financial and competitive information available to us as of the date of this release and we assume no obligation to update these forward-looking statements. These statements are subject to risks and uncertainties that could cause actual results to differ materially from those described in the statements, including but not limited to: increasing wage inflation and the competitive labor market, including as a result of regulations such as California AB 1228, which impacts our ability to attract and retain qualified employees and has resulted in occasional staffing shortages; the impact of any union organizing efforts and our responses to such efforts; increasing supply costs (including beef, tortillas, queso, salsa, beans and rice); risks of food safety incidents and food-borne illnesses; risks associated with our reliance on certain information technology systems and potential material failures or interruptions; privacy and cyber security risks, including risk of breaches, unauthorized access, theft, modification</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">, &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">destruction </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">or ransom </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">of guest or employee personal or confidential information stored on our network or the network of third party providers; the impact of competition, including from sources outside the restaurant industry; the financial impact of increasing our average hourly wages; the impact of federal, state or local government regulations relating to our employees, employment practices, restaurant design and construction, and the sale of food or alcoholic beverages; our ability to achieve our planned growth, such as the costs and availability of suitable new restaurant sites, construction materials and contractors and the expected costs to accelerate our international expansion through franchise restaurants in the Middle East; increases in ingredient and other operating costs due to inflation, global conflicts, climate change, our Food with Integrity philosophy, tariffs or trade restrictions and supply shortages; the uncertainty of our ability to achieve expected levels of comparable restaurant sales due to factors such as changes in </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">guests&#x2019;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;"> perceptions of our brand, including as a result of actual or rumored food safety concerns or other negative publicity, decreased consumer spending (including as a result of higher inflation, mass layoffs, fear of possible recession and higher energy prices), or the inability to increase menu prices or realize the benefits of menu price increases; risks associated with our digital business, including risks arising from our reliance on third party delivery services; risks relating to litigation, including possible governmental actions and potential class action litigation related to food safety incidents, cybersecurity incidents, employment or privacy laws, advertising claims or other matters; and other risk factors described from time to time in our SEC reports, including our annual report on Form 10-K and quarterly reports on Form 10-Q, all of which are available on the investor relations page of our website at ir.Chipotle.com</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">. &nbsp;</font>
		</p>

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div>
		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;;font-size: 10pt"><font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;"></font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<a name="_Hlk30523446"></a><font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">C</font><font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">HIPOTLE MEXICAN GRILL, INC.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 3pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">R</font><font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">ECONCILIATION OF NON-GAAP FINANCIAL MEASURES</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:13pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;">The following tables provide a reconciliation of non-GAAP financial measures presented in the text above to the most directly comparable financial measures calculated and presented in accordance with GAAP. </font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;">Adjusted net income is net income excluding expenses related to </font><font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">restaurant </font><font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">and corporate </font><font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">asset impairment, corporate restructuring, certain legal proceedings, stock-</font><font style="display: inline;">based compensation modification expense, unrealized gains on equity investments, separation costs, </font><font style="display: inline;">accelerated </font><font style="display: inline;">depreciation and certain other costs. Adjusted general and administrative expense is general and administrative expense excluding corporate restructuring expenses, certain legal proceedings, stock-based compensation modification expense, separation costs, and certain other costs. Adjusted depreciation and amortization is depreciation and amortization expense excluding certain accelerated depreciation expense. The adjusted effective income tax rate is the effective income tax rate adjusted to reflect the after tax impact of non-GAAP adjustments. Restaurant Level Operating Margin, a non-GAAP financial measure, is equal to the revenues generated by our restaurants less their direct operating costs which consist of food, beverage and packaging, labor, occupancy and other operating costs. This performance measure primarily includes the costs that restaurant level managers can directly control and excludes other costs that are essential to conduct our business. Management uses restaurant level operating margin as a measure of restaurant performance. Management believes restaurant level operating margin is useful to investors in that it highlights trends in our core business that may not otherwise be apparent to investors when relying solely on GAAP financial measures. We present these non-GAAP measures in order to facilitate meaningful evaluation of our operating performance across periods. These adjustments are intended to provide greater transparency of underlying performance and to allow investors to evaluate our business on the same basis as our management, which uses these non-GAAP measures in evaluating the company&#x2019;s performance. Our adjusted net income, adjusted diluted earnings per share, adjusted general and administrative expenses, adjusted effective income tax rate and restaurant level operating margin measures may not be comparable to other companies&#x2019; adjusted measures. These adjustments are not necessarily indicative of what our actual financial performance would have been during the periods presented and should be viewed in addition to, and not as an alternative to, our results prepared in accordance with GAAP. Further details regarding these adjustments are included in the tables below.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

		</p>
		<p><font size="1"> </font></p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div><hr size="3" style="color:#999999" width="100%" align="center"></hr><p style="page-break-after:always">&nbsp;</p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div>
		<p style="margin:0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;;font-size: 10pt"><font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">CHIPOTLE MEXICAN GRILL, INC.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">RECONCILIATION OF NON-GAAP FINANCIAL MEASURES</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:13pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">Adjusted Net Income and Adjusted Diluted Earnings </font><font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">p</font><font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">er Share</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 3pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">(in thousands, except per share amounts)</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">(unaudited)</font>
		</p>

					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						&nbsp;</p>
				</td>
				<td valign="bottom" style="width:07.96%;border-top:2pt double #000000 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;text-align:right;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(1) For the year ended December 31, 2023, third-party vendor expense, stock-based compensation, and employee severance related to the May 2023 optimization of our organizational structure. For the three months and year ended December 31, 2022, charges relate to duplicate rent expense for office and restaurant closures announced in June 2018 due to the corporate restructuring and underperformance of $881 and $3,937, respectively.</font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(2) Charges/(reduction) for estimated settlements for distinct legal matters that exceeded or are expected to exceed typical costs for these types of legal proceedings.</font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>

				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(3) Charges for a COVID-19 related modification made in December 2020 to our 2018 performance shares.</font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>

					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

				<td valign="bottom" style="width:01.54%;border-top:2pt double #000000 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						&nbsp;</p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="top" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;">(1) Adjustments related to the tax effect of non-GAAP adjustments, which were determined based on the nature of the underlying non-GAAP adjustments and their relevant jurisdictional tax rates.</font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
		</table></div>
		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;">&#xFEFF;</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

<FILENAME>Show.js
<DESCRIPTION>IDEA: XBRL DOCUMENT
<TEXT>
// Edgar(tm) Renderer was created by staff of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.  Data and content created by government employees within the scope of their employment are not subject to domestic copyright protection. 17 U.S.C. 105.
var Show={};Show.LastAR=null,Show.showAR=function(a,r,w){if(Show.LastAR)Show.hideAR();var e=a;while(e&&e.nodeName!='TABLE')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e||e.nodeName!='TABLE'){var ref=((window)?w.document:document).getElementById(r);if(ref){e=ref.cloneNode(!0);
e.removeAttribute('id');a.parentNode.appendChild(e)}}
if(e)e.style.display='block';Show.LastAR=e};Show.hideAR=function(){Show.LastAR.style.display='none'};Show.toggleNext=function(a){var e=a;while(e.nodeName!='DIV')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e.style){}else if(!e.style.display){}else{var d,p_;if(e.style.display=='none'){d='block';p='-'}else{d='none';p='+'}
e.style.display=d;if(a.textContent){a.textContent=p+a.textContent.substring(1)}else{a.innerText=p+a.innerText.substring(1)}}}
</TEXT>

<DESCRIPTION>IDEA: XBRL DOCUMENT
<TEXT>
/* Updated 2009-11-04 */
/* v2.2.0.24 */

/* DefRef Styles */
..report table.authRefData{
	background-color: #def;
	border: 2px solid #2F4497;
	font-size: 1em;
	position: absolute;
}

..report table.authRefData a {
	display: block;
	font-weight: bold;
}

..report table.authRefData p {
	margin-top: 0px;
}

..report table.authRefData .hide {
	background-color: #2F4497;
	padding: 1px 3px 0px 0px;
	text-align: right;
}

..report table.authRefData .hide a:hover {
	background-color: #2F4497;
}

..report table.authRefData .body {
	height: 150px;
	overflow: auto;
	width: 400px;
}

..report table.authRefData table{
	font-size: 1em;
}

/* Report Styles */
..pl a, .pl a:visited {
	color: black;
	text-decoration: none;
}

/* table */
..report {
	background-color: white;
	border: 2px solid #acf;
	clear: both;
	color: black;
	font: normal 8pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	margin-bottom: 2em;
}

..report hr {
	border: 1px solid #acf;
}

/* Top labels */
..report th {
	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
	text-align: center;
}

..report th.void	{
	background-color: transparent;
	color: #000000;
	font: bold 10pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	text-align: left;
}

..report .pl {
	text-align: left;
	vertical-align: top;
	white-space: normal;
	width: 200px;
	white-space: normal; /* word-wrap: break-word; */
}

..report td.pl a.a {
	cursor: pointer;
	display: block;
	width: 200px;
	overflow: hidden;
}

..report td.pl div.a {
	width: 200px;
}

..report td.pl a:hover {
	background-color: #ffc;
}

/* Header rows... */
..report tr.rh {
	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
}

/* Calendars... */
..report .rc {
	background-color: #f0f0f0;
}

/* Even rows... */
..report .re, .report .reu {
	background-color: #def;
}

..report .reu td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

/* Odd rows... */
..report .ro, .report .rou {
	background-color: white;
}

..report .rou td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

..report .rou table td, .report .reu table td {
	border-bottom: 0px solid black;
}

/* styles for footnote marker */
..report .fn {
	white-space: nowrap;
}

/* styles for numeric types */
..report .num, .report .nump {
	text-align: right;
	white-space: nowrap;
}

..report .nump {
	padding-left: 2em;
}

..report .nump {
	padding: 0px 0.4em 0px 2em;
}

/* styles for text types */
..report .text {
	text-align: left;
	white-space: normal;
}

..report .text .big {
	margin-bottom: 1em;
	width: 17em;
}

..report .text .more {
	display: none;
}

..report .text .note {
	font-style: italic;
	font-weight: bold;
}

..report .text .small {
	width: 10em;
}

..report sup {
	font-style: italic;
}

..report .outerFootnotes {
	font-size: 1em;
}
</TEXT>
